desc: I designed and impemented a testing suite for the Norton licensing platform that manages all Symantec consumer products. title: E-Health Research Lab, UCLA

desc: BREATHE is a project that utilizes sensor-based research to prevent asthma attacks in pediatric patients. I work on server-side development in a Python-Flask environment with a NoSQL database. I've implemented database redesigns, enhanced security features, and server encryption.

desc: As President of the Engineering Society, I lead a board of 22 engineers aimed at connecting engineering students with the School of Engineering, industry, and one another.
